title: Gurman: iMac with M3 chip already in the works, could be released later next year
content:
While Apple just finished introducing all the M1 chip variants, and we wait for the first batch of M2 computers, it seems the Cupertino company is already working on its third generation of silicon for Macs – and iPads. The M3 iMac is coming; here’s what we know.

more…

The post Gurman: iMac with M3 chip already in the works, could be released later next year appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is already working on an M3 iMac, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. Here’s what we know so far about this upcoming chip.
